channel.title: AAWSAP on UFO History
channel.description: Recent content in AAWSAP on UFO History

item.title: Advanced Aerospace Weapon Systems Applications Program (AAWSAP) Established
item.description: The details of this project are still being revealed - however the following seems to be accurate. In 2007 the DIA established the Advanced Aerospace Weapon Systems Applications Program (AAWSAP) to investigate so-called ‘breakthrough technologies’ and develop an understanding of the threat they might pose to the United States of America. According to The Black Vault: …this contract was awarded to Bigelow Aerospaceâ€˜s subsidiary Bigelow Aerospace Advanced Space Studies (BAASS).

item.title: Creation of Bigelow Aerospace Advanced Space Studies (BAASS)
James Lacatski discusses paranormal with colleague
item.description: Lacatski meets in DWO (Defense Warning Office) Office with “Jonathan Axelrod” to talk about tales of the paranormal. “Axelrod” takes the book to Iraq while deployed. Mentioned by John Greenwald Jr in AAWSAP & AATIP: Why Confusion Continues To Reign and Questions Continue to Linger and also stated in Skinwalkers at the Pentagon.

item.title: James Lacatski reads Hunt for the Skinwalker
item.description: DIA rocket scientist James Lacatski reads Hunt for the Skinwalker, becomes interested in miltary applications and possible threats regarding the phenomena at Skinwalker Ranch. It is this event which leads Lacatski to arrange a visit to the ranch, and later to the creation of AAWSAP. Mentioned by John Greenwald Jr in AAWSAP & AATIP: Why Confusion Continues To Reign and Questions Continue to Linger and also stated in Skinwalkers at the Pentagon.
